Song.title: What A Savior
Song.copyright: Verses by Philip Bliss Music & Chorus by Devon Kauflin Â© 2008 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [E]Man of Sorrows, [B]what a name [E/G#]For the Son of [A]God who came [C#m]Ruined sinners [B]to reclaim, halle[A]lujah [B] [E]Bearing shame and [B]scoffing rude [E/G#]In my place con[A]demned He stood [C#m]Sealed my pardon [B]with His blood Halle[A]lujah, [B] [ ]halle[F#m7]lujah [A] [B]
CHORUS: [E]Savior, [B]You showed Your love De[A]feated our sin, [B]poured out your blood So we [E]praise You, [B]Lamb that was slain We [A]offer our lives to pro[B]claim: "What a [F#m7]Savior"
VERSE 2: [E]Guilty, vile, and [B]helpless we [E/G#]Spotless Lamb of [A]God was He [C#m]Full atonement, [B]can it be, halle[A]lujah [B] [E]Lifted up was [B]He to die, [E/G#]"It is finished," [A]was His cry [C#m]Now in heav'n ex[B]alted high, Halle[A]lujah, [B] [ ]halle[F#m7]lujah [A] [B]
VERSE 3: [E]When He comes, our [B]glorious King [E/G#]All His ransomed [A]home to bring [C#m]Then anew this [B]song we'll sing Halle[A]lujah, [B] [ ]halle[F#m7]lujah [A] [B]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 man of sorrows what a name for the son of god who came ruined sinners to reclaim hallelujah bearing shame and scoffing rude in my place condemned he stood sealed my pardon with his blood hallelujah hallelujah chorus savior you showed your love defeated our sin poured out your blood so we praise you lamb that was slain we offer our lives to proclaim what a savior verse 2 guilty vile and helpless we spotless lamb of god was he full atonement can it be hallelujah lifted up was he to die it is finished was his cry now in heavn exalted high hallelujah hallelujah verse 3 when he comes our glorious king all his ransomed home to bring then anew this song well sing hallelujah hallelujah
